headline: Lam Research Corporation Announces June Quarter Financial Conference Call
summary: Lam Research Corp. (NASDAQ: LRCX) today announced that the company will host its quarterly financial conference call and webcast on Wednesday, July 30, 2025, beginning at 2:00 p.m. Pacific Daylight Time (5:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time).

headline: AMAT Rides on AI Demand: Will Logic and DRAM Strength Last?

headline: Lam Research Expands in India: A Strategic Hedge Against Trade Risks?
summary: LRCX's $1.2 billion India investment expands its global footprint, offering a hedge against trade risks and supply disruptions.

headline: Semiconductor Dry Etch Systems Market Forecasts Report 2025-2030 | Increasing Demand for Optoelectronics and Sensors Bolster Growth
summary: The semiconductor dry etch systems market is set to grow at a 5.23% CAGR from $18.45 billion in 2025 to $23.81 billion by 2030. Rising demand for optoelectronics, sensors, and advanced etching fuels growth. Major players include Applied Materials and Lam Research, with strong U.S. market influence.
